article.headline: Grambling 80, Prairie View 61
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas (AP) -- Brion Rush scored 24 points and had 10 rebounds to lead Grambling State to an 80-61 victory over Prairie View Monday night. Rush was 8-of-18 from the field, including 3-of-9 from 3-point range. Eight of his 10 rebounds came under Prairie View's basket. Paul Haynes added 14 points, Maurice Searight had 13 and Ron Ellis had 12 for Grambling State (8-15, 6-7 Southwestern Athletic). Grambling State took the lead for good with 3:01 left in the first half on a basket by Searight. The Tigers led 32-24 at the half. Tyrone Nelson led Prairie View (5-16, 5-7) with 19 points and Kevin Cooper added 15. Grambling State shot 46 percent from the field while Prairie View shot 36 percent.
